   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          range_archive_request/1,
   37:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   38:          limit_archive_request/1,
   39:          prefs_set_request/1,
   40:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   41:          pagination_first5/1,
   42:          pagination_last5/1,
   43:          pagination_before10/1,
   44:          pagination_after10/1,
   45:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   46:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   47:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   48:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   49:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   50:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   51:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   52:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   53:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   54:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   55:          archived/1,
   56:          strip_archived/1,
   57:          filter_forwarded/1,
   58:          policy_violation/1,
   59:          offline_message/1,
   60:          purge_single_message/1,
   61:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   62:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   63:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   64:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   65:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   66:          iq_spoofing/1,
   67:          run_prefs_cases/1,
   68:          run_set_and_get_prefs_cases/1]).
   69: 
   70: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   71: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   72: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   73: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   74: 
   75: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   76:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   77:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   78:     )).
   79: 
   80: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   81:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   82:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   83:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   84:     )).
   85: 
   86: -record(rsm_in, {
   87:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   88:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   89:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
   90:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   91:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
   92:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
   93:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
   94:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
   95:         simple = false :: boolean(),
   96:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
   97:         }).
   98: 
   99: -record(forwarded_message, {
  100:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  101:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  102:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  103:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  104:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  105:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  106:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  107:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  108:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined
  109: }).
  110: 
  111: -record(result_iq, {
  112:     from            :: binary(),
  113:     to              :: binary(),
  114:     id              :: binary(),
  115:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  116:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  117:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  118:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  119: }).
  120: 
  121: -record(error_iq, {
  122:     id              :: binary(),
  123:     type            :: binary(),
  124:     error_type      :: binary(),
  125:     condition       :: binary(),
  126:     text            :: binary()
  127: }).
  128: 
  129: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  130:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  131:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  132:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  133: }).
  134: 
  135: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  136: %% Suite configuration
  137: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  138: 
  139: muc_host() ->
  140:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  141: 
  142: host() ->
  143:     <<"localhost">>.
  144: 
  145: configurations() ->
  146:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  147:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  148: 
  149: odbc_configs(true) ->
  150:     [odbc,
  151:      odbc_simple,
  152:      odbc_async_pool,
  153:      odbc_mnesia,
  154:      odbc_dirty_mnesia,
  155:      odbc_async_cache,
  156:      odbc_cache,
  157:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  158:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  159: odbc_configs(_) ->
  160:     [].
  161: 
  162: riak_configs(true) ->
  163:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  164: riak_configs(_) ->
  165:      [].
  166: 
  167: basic_group_names() ->
  168:     [
  169:     mam,
  170:     mam_purge,
  171:     muc,
  172:     muc_with_pm,
  173:     rsm,
  174:     with_rsm,
  175:     muc_rsm,
  176:     bootstrapped,
  177:     archived,
  178:     policy_violation,
  179:     offline_message,
  180:     prefs_cases
  181:     ].
  182: 
  183: all() ->
  184:     Reasons =
  185:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  186:         false -> [require_odbc];
  187:         true  -> []
  188:     end,
  189:     case Reasons of
  190:         [] ->
  191:             tests();
  192:         [_|_] ->
  193:             {skip, Reasons}
  194:     end.
  195: 
  196: tests() ->
  197:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  198:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  199:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  200: 
  201: groups() ->
  202:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  203:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  204:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  205: 
  206: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  207:     false.
  208: 
  209: 
  210: basic_groups() ->
  211:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  212:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  213:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  214:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  215:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  216:      {offline_message,  [], offline_message_cases()},
  217:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  218:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  219:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  220:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  221:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  222:      {prefs_cases,      [], [run_prefs_cases,
  223:                              run_set_and_get_prefs_cases]}].
  224: 
  225: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  226:      [purge_old_single_message,
  227:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  228: 
  229: mam_cases() ->
  230:     [mam_service_discovery,
  231:      simple_archive_request,
  232:      range_archive_request,
  233:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  234:      limit_archive_request,
  235:      prefs_set_request,
  236:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  237:      iq_spoofing].
  238: 
  239: mam_purge_cases() ->
  240:     [purge_single_message,
  241:      purge_multiple_messages].
  242: 
  243: archived_cases() ->
  244:     [archived,
  245:      strip_archived,
  246:      filter_forwarded].
  247: 
  248: policy_violation_cases() ->
  249:     [policy_violation].
  250: 
  251: offline_message_cases() ->
  252:     [offline_message].
  253: 
  254: muc_cases() ->
  255:     [muc_service_discovery,
  256:      muc_archive_request,
  257:      muc_archive_purge,
  258:      muc_multiple_devices,
  259:      muc_private_message,
  260:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  261:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  262:      ].
  263: 
  264: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  265:     rsm_cases().
  266: 
  267: with_rsm_cases() ->
  268:     rsm_cases().
  269: 
  270: rsm_cases() ->
  271:       [pagination_first5,
  272:        pagination_last5,
  273:        pagination_before10,
  274:        pagination_after10,
  275:        pagination_empty_rset,
  276:        %% Border cases
  277:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  278:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  279:        %% Simple cases
  280:        pagination_simple_before10,
  281:        %% opt_count cases
  282:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  283:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  284:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  285:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  286:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  287:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  288:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  289: 
  290: suite() ->
  291:     escalus:suite().
  292: 
  293: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  294:     disable_shaping(
  295:       delete_users([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  296:                   | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)])).
  297: 
  298: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  299:     escalus:end_per_suite(restore_shaping(Config)).
  300: 
  301: user_names() ->
  302:     [alice, bob, kate].
  303: 
  304: create_users(Config) ->
  305:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  306: 
  307: delete_users(Config) ->
  308:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}),
  309:     Config.
  310: 
  311: disable_shaping(Config) ->
  312:     OldShaper = get_shaper(),
  313:     set_shaper({maxrate, 100}),
  314:     [{old_mam_shaper, OldShaper}|Config].
  315: 
  316: restore_shaping(Config) ->
  317:     OldShaper = proplists:get_value(old_mam_shaper, Config),
  318:     set_shaper(OldShaper),
  319:     Config.
  320: 
  321: get_shaper() ->
  322:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}]).
  323: 
  324: set_shaper(NewValue) ->
  325:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}, NewValue]),
  326:     rpc_apply(shaper_srv, reset_all_shapers, [host()]).
  327: 
  328: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  329:    C = configuration(Group),
  330:    B = basic_group(Group),
  331:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  332:         skip ->
  333:             {skip, print_configuration_not_supported(C, B)};
  334:         Config0 ->
  335:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  336:                    [Group, C, B]),
  337:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  338:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  339:     end.
  340: 
  341: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  342:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  343:     case C of
  344:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  345:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  346:         _ ->
  347:             Config0
  348:     end.
  349: 
  350: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  351:     delete_users(Config),
  352:     C = configuration(Group),
  353:     B = basic_group(Group),
  354:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  355: 
  356: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  357:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  358: 
  359: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  360:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  361:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  362:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  363:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  364:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  365:     Config;
  366: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  367:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  368:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  369:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  370:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  371:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  372:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  373:     Config;
  374: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  375:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm, simple]),
  376:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  377:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  378:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  379:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  380:     Config;
  381: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  382:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  383:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  384:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  385:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  386:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  387:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  388:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  389:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  390:     Config;
  391: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  392:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  393:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  394:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  395:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  396:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  397:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  398:     Config;
  399: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  400:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  401:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  402:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  403:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  404:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  405:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  406:     Config;
  407: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  408:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  409:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  410:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  411:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  412:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  413:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  414:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  415:     Config;
  416: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  417:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  418:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  419:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  420:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  421:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  422:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  423:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  425:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  426:     Config;
  427: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  428:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  432:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  433:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  434:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  435:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  436:     Config;
  437: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  438:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  440:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  441:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  442:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  443:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  445:     Config;
  446: 
  447: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  448:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  449:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  451:     Config;
  452: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  453:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  454:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  455:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  456:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  457:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  458:     Config;
  459: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc, Config) ->
  460:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [muc, simple]),
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  463:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  464:     Config;
  465: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  466:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  468:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  469:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  471:     Config;
  472: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  474:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  475:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  476:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  477:     Config;
  478: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  479:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  480:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [muc]),
  481:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  483:     Config;
  484: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  485:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  486:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  487:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  490:     Config;
  491: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  492:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  493:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  497:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  498:     Config;
  499: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  500:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  501:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  503:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  504:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  505:     Config;
  506: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  507:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  508:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  509:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  510:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  511:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  512:     Config;
  513: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  515:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  516:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  517:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  518:     Config;
  519: init_modules(odbc_simple, _, Config) ->
  520:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  521:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, simple]),
  522:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  523:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  524:     Config;
  525: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  526:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  527:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  528:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  529:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  530:     Config;
  531: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  532:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  533:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  534:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm]),
  535:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  536:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  537:     Config;
  538: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  539:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  540:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm, muc]),
  541:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  542:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  543:     Config;
  544: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  545:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  546:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  547:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  548:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  549:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  550:     Config;
  551: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  552:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  553:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  554:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  555:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  556:     Config;
  557: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  558:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  559:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  560:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [pm]),
  561:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  562:     Config;
  563: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  564:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  565:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  566:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  567:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  568:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  569:     Config;
  570: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  571:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  572:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  573:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  574:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  575:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  576:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  577:     Config;
  578: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  579:     skip;
  580: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  581:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  582:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  583:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  584:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  585:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  586:     Config.
  587: 
  588: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  589:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  590:     Config.
  591: 
  592: mam_modules() ->
  593:     [mod_mam,
  594:      mod_mam_muc,
  595:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  596:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  597:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  598:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  599:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  600:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  601:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  602:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  603:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  604:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  605:      mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs,
  606:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  607:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  608:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  609:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  610: 
  611: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  612:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  613:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  614:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  615:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  616: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  617:     Config;
  618: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  619:     Config;
  620: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  621:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  622: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  623:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  624:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  625: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  626:     clean_archives(Config);
  627: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  628:     clean_archives(Config).
  629: 
  630: 
  631: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  632:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  633:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  634:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  635:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  636:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  637:                                        ],
  638:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  639:                  _ ->
  640:                      ConfigIn
  641:              end,
  642:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  643: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  644:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  645: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  646:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  647: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  648:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  649: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  650:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  651: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  652:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  653:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  654: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  655:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  656:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  657: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  658:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  659:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  660: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  661:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  662:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  663: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  664:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  665:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  666: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  667:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  668: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  669:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  670: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  671:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  672: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  673:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  674: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  675:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  676:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  677: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  678:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  679: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  680:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  681: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  682:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  683: 
  684: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  685:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  686:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  687:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  688:         _ ->
  689:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  690:     end.
  691: 
  692: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  693:     destroy_room(Config),
  694:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  695: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  696:     destroy_room(Config),
  697:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  698: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  699:     destroy_room(Config),
  700:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  701: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  702:     destroy_room(Config),
  703:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  704: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  705:     destroy_room(Config),
  706:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  707: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  708:     destroy_room(Config),
  709:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  710: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  711:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  712: 
  713: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  714:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  715:     orelse
  716:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  717:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  718:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  719: 
  720: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  721:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  722: 
  723: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  724:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  725: 
  726: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  727:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  728:         non_existing -> ok;
  729:         false        -> ok;
  730:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  731:     end.
  732: 
  733: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  734:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  735:     ok.
  736: 
  737: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  738:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  739:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  740:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  741:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  742:     Result ->
  743:         Result
  744:     end.
  745: 
  746: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  747:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  748:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  749:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  750: 
  751: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  752: %% Group name helpers
  753: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  754: 
  755: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  756:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  757: 
  758: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  759: configuration(Group) ->
  760:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  761: 
  762: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  763: %% will be tested.
  764: %%
  765: %% Example:
  766: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  767: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  768: %% @end
  769: make_greedy(List) ->
  770:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  771: 
  772: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  773: basic_group(Group) ->
  774:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  775: 
  776: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  777:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  778:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  779:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  780: 
  781: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  782:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  783: 
  784: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  785:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  786:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  787:         true -> PrefixA;
  788:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  789:     end.
  790: 
  791: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  792:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  793: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  794:     Target.
  795: 
  796: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  797:     Tail.
  798: 
  799: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  800: %% Adhoc tests
  801: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  802: 
  803: %% Querying the archive for messages
  804: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  805:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  806:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  807:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  808:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  809:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  810:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  811:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  812:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  813:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  814:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  815:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  816:         assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  817:         ok
  818:         end,
  819:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  820:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  821:                       ],
  822:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  823:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  824: 
  825: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  826:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  827:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  828:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  829: 
  830:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  831: 
  832:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  833:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID)),
  834:         assert_respond_size(CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  835:         ok
  836:         end,
  837:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  838: 
  839: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  840:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  841:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  842:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  843: 
  844:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  845: 
  846:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(<<>>),
  847:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  848:         assert_respond_size(MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  849: 
  850:         ok
  851:         end,
  852:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  853: 
  854: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  855:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  856:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  857:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  858: 
  859:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  860:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  861:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  862: 
  863:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID),
  864:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  865:         Result = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
  866: 
  867:         assert_respond_size(Len, Result),
  868:         ok
  869:         end,
  870:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  871: 
  872: archived(Config) ->
  873:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  874:         %% Archive must be empty.
  875:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  876:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  877: 
  878:         %% Bob receives a message.
  879:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  880:         try
  881:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  882:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  883:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  884:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  885:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  886: 
  887:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  888: 
  889:         %% Bob calls archive.
  890:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  891:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  892:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  893:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  894:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  895:         ok
  896:         catch Class:Reason ->
  897:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  898:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  899:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  900:         end
  901:         end,
  902:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  903: 
  904: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
  905:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  906:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  907:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  908: 
  909:         %% Bob receives a message.
  910:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  911:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  912:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  913:         [_ArcIQ1, _ArcMsg1] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  914: 
  915:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
  916:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  917:         [_ArcIQ2, _ArcMsg2] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  918:         ok
  919:         end,
  920:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  921: 
  922: strip_archived(Config) ->
  923:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  924:         %% Archive must be empty.
  925:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  926:         escalus:send(Alice,
  927:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
  928:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  929:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
  930: 
  931:         %% Bob receives a message.
  932:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  933:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  934:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  935:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  936:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  937:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  938: 
  939:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
  940: 
  941:         try
  942:         %% Bob calls archive.
  943:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  944:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  945:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  946:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  947:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
  948:         ok
  949:         catch Class:Reason ->
  950:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  951:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  952:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  953:         end
  954:         end,
  955:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  956: 
  957: wait_archive_respond_iq_first(User) ->
  958:     %% rot1
  959:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond(User)),
  960:     [IQ|lists:reverse(Messages)].
  961: 
  962: wait_archive_respond(User) ->
  963:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
  964:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
  965:         true ->
  966:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
  967:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
  968:         false -> ok
  969:     end,
  970:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
  971:         true  -> [S];
  972:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond(User)]
  973:     end.
  974: 
  975: assert_respond_size(Size, Respond) when length(Respond) =:= (Size + 1) ->
  976:     Respond;
  977: assert_respond_size(ExpectedSize, Respond) ->
  978:     RespondSize = length(Respond) - 1,
  979:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
  980:     %% void()
  981: 
  982: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
  983: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
  984: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
  985: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
  986: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
  987: policy_violation(Config) ->
  988:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  989:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
  990:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
  991:         [escalus:send(Alice,
  992:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
  993:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
  994:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
  995:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
  996:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  997:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
  998:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"will_fail">>)),
  999:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1000:         try
 1001:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
 1002:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
 1003:             ok
 1004:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1005:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1006:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
 1007:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1008:         end
 1009:         end,
 1010:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1011: 
 1012: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
 1013: offline_message(Config) ->
 1014:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
 1015:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1016:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
 1017:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1018:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
 1019:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1020:         ok
 1021:         end,
 1022:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
 1023: 
 1024:     %% Bob logs in
 1025:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
 1026: 
 1027:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
 1028:     %% will be delivered automatically.
 1029: 
 1030:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
 1031:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
 1032: 
 1033:     %% Bob checks his archive.
 1034:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
 1035:     [_ArcRes | ArcMsgs] = R = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob),
 1036:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1037: 
 1038:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
 1039: 
 1040: purge_single_message(Config) ->
 1041:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1042:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1043:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1044:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
 1045:             [_IQ, Mess] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1046:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
 1047:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1048:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1049:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1050:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1051:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1052:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1053:             ok
 1054:         end,
 1055:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1056: 
 1057: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
 1058:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1059:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
 1060:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1061:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
 1062:             [_IQ|AllMessages] = assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize,
 1063:                 wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1064:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1065:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1066:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1067:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1068:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1069:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1070:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1071:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1072:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1073:             assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1074:             ok
 1075:         end,
 1076:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1077: 
 1078: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1079:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1080:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1081:             [begin
 1082:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1083:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N))),
 1084:                  timer:sleep(100)
 1085:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1086:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1087:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1088:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1089:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1090:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1091:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1092:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1093:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1094:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1095:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1096:             ok
 1097:         end,
 1098:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1099: 
 1100: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1101:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1102:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1103:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1104:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1105:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1106:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1107: 
 1108:         %% Bob received presences.
 1109:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1110: 
 1111:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1112:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1113: 
 1114:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1115: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1116: 
 1117:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1118:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1119:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1120:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1121:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1122:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1123:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1124:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1125:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1126:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1127: 
 1128:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1129: 
 1130:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1131:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1132:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1133:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1134:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1135:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1136:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1137:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1138:         ok
 1139:         end,
 1140:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1141: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1142: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1143:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1144:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1145:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1146:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1147:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1148:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1149: 
 1150:         %% Bob received presences.
 1151:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1152: 
 1153:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1154:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1155: 
 1156:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1157:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1158: 
 1159:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1160:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1161:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1162:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1163:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1164:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1165:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1166:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1167:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1168:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1169:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1170:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1171:         ok
 1172:     end,
 1173:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1174: 
 1175: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1176:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1177:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1178:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1179:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1180:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1181:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1182:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1183:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1184: 
 1185:         %% Alice received presences.
 1186:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1187:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1188: 
 1189:         %% Bob received presences.
 1190:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1191: 
 1192:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1193:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1194: 
 1195:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1196:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1197:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1198: 
 1199:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1200: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1201: 
 1202:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1203:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1204:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1205: 
 1206:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1207:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1208: 
 1209:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1210:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1211:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1212: 
 1213:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1214:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1215:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1216:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1217:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1218:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1219:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1220:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1221:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1222:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1223: 
 1224:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1225: 
 1226:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1227: 
 1228:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1229: 
 1230:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1231:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1232:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1233:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1234:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1235:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1236:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1237:         ok
 1238:         end,
 1239:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1240: 
 1241: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1242:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1243:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1244:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1245:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1246:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1247: 
 1248:         %% Bob received presences.
 1249:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1250: 
 1251:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1252:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1253: 
 1254:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1255:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1256:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1257:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1258: 
 1259:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1260:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1261:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1262: 
 1263:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1264:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1265:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1266:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1267:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1268:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1269: 
 1270:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1271:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1272:         [_ArcRes] = assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1273:         ok
 1274:         end,
 1275:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1276: 
 1277: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1278: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1279:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1280:         %% Send
 1281:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1282:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1283:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1284:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1285:         %%   </query>
 1286:         %% </iq>
 1287:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request()),
 1288:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1289:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1290:         ok
 1291:         end,
 1292:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1293: 
 1294: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1295:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1296:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1297:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1298:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1299:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1300:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1301:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1302:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1303:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1304:         %% Send
 1305:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1306:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1307:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1308:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1309:         %%   </query>
 1310:         %% </iq>
 1311:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(StartTime, StopTime)),
 1312:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1313:         M1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1314:         M2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1315:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1316:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1317:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1318:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1319:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1320:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1321:         ok
 1322:         end,
 1323:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1324: 
 1325: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1326:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1327:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1328:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1329:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1330: 
 1331: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1332: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1333: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1334:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1335:         %% Send
 1336:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1337:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1338:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1339:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1340:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1341:         %%       </set>
 1342:         %%   </query>
 1343:         %% </iq>
 1344:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request()),
 1345:         [IQ | Msgs] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 1346:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1347:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1348:         ok
 1349:         end,
 1350:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1351: 
 1352: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1353:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1354:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1355:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1356: 
 1357:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1358:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1359:         wait_empty_rset(Alice, 15)
 1360:         end,
 1361:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1362: 
 1363: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1364:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1365:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1366:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1367:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1368:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1369:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1370:         ok
 1371:         end,
 1372:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1373: 
 1374: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1375:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1376:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1377:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1378:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1379:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1380:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1381:         ok
 1382:         end,
 1383:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1384: 
 1385: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1386:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1387:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1388:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1389:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1390:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1391:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1392:         ok
 1393:         end,
 1394:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1395: 
 1396: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1397:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1398:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1399:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1400:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1401:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1402:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1403:         ok
 1404:         end,
 1405:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1406: 
 1407: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1408:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1409:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1410:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1411:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1412:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1413:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1414:         ok
 1415:         end,
 1416:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1417: 
 1418: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1419:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1420:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1421:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1422:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1423:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1424:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1425:         ok
 1426:         end,
 1427:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1428: 
 1429: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1430:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1431:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1432:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1433:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1434:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1435:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 10),
 1436:         ok
 1437:         end,
 1438:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1439: 
 1440: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1441:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1442:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1443:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1444:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1445:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1446:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 15),
 1447:         ok
 1448:         end,
 1449:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1450: 
 1451: 
 1452: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1453:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1454:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1455:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1456:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1457:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1458:         wait_message_range(Alice, 5, 9),
 1459:         ok
 1460:         end,
 1461:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1462: 
 1463: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1464:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1465:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1466:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1467:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1468:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1469:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1470:         wait_message_range(Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1471:         ok
 1472:         end,
 1473:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1474: 
 1475: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1476:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1477:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1478:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1479:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1480:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1481:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1482:         ok
 1483:         end,
 1484:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1485: 
 1486: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1487: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1488: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1489:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1490:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1491:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1492:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1493:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1494:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1495:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1496:         wait_message_range(Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1497:         ok
 1498:         end,
 1499:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1500: 
 1501: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1502: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1503:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1504:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1505:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1506:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1507:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1508:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1509:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1510:         wait_message_range(Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1511:         ok
 1512:         end,
 1513:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1514: 
 1515: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1516:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1517: 
 1518: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1519:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1520:         true ->
 1521:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1522:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1523:         _ ->
 1524:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1525:     end.
 1526: 
 1527: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1528:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1529:         true ->
 1530:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1531:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1532:         _ ->
 1533:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1534:     end.
 1535: 
 1536: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1537:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1538:         %% Send
 1539:         %%
 1540:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1541:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1542:         %%     <always>
 1543:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1544:         %%     </always>
 1545:         %%     <never>
 1546:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1547:         %%     </never>
 1548:         %%   </prefs>
 1549:         %% </iq>
 1550:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1551:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1552:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1553:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1554: 
 1555:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1556:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1557: 
 1558:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1559:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1560:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1561:         ok
 1562:         end,
 1563:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1564: 
 1565: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1566: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1567: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1568: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1569: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1570:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1571:         %% Send
 1572:         %%
 1573:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1574:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1575:         %%     <always>
 1576:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1577:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1578:         %%     </always>
 1579:         %%   </prefs>
 1580:         %% </iq>
 1581:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1582:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1583:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1584:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1585:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1586: 
 1587:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1588:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1589: 
 1590:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1591:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1592:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1593:         ok
 1594:         end,
 1595:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1596: 
 1597: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1598:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1599:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1600:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1601:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1602:         try
 1603:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1604:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1605:         ok
 1606:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1607:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1608:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1609:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1610:         end
 1611:         end,
 1612:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1613: 
 1614: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1615: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1616:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1617:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1618:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1619:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1620:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1621:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1622:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1623:         ok
 1624:         end,
 1625:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1626: 
 1627: iq_spoofing(Config) ->
 1628:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1629:         %% Sending iqs between clients is allowed.
 1630:         %% Every client MUST check "from" and "id" attributes.
 1631:         %% This test checks, that server assign corrent "from" attribute
 1632:         %% when it is not specified.
 1633:         To = escalus_utils:get_jid(Alice),
 1634:         From = escalus_utils:get_jid(Bob),
 1635:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:to(result_iq(), To)),
 1636:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1637:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(From, Stanza),
 1638:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 1639:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 1640:         ok
 1641:         end,
 1642:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1643: 
 1644: result_iq() ->
 1645:     #xmlel{
 1646:         name = <<"iq">>,
 1647:         attrs = [{<<"id">>,<<"xxx">>}, {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1648:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"query">>}]}.
 1649: 
 1650: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1651: %% Helpers
 1652: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1653: 
 1654: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1655: 
 1656: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1657: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1658: 
 1659: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1660:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1661:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1662:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1663:     }]).
 1664: 
 1665: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1666:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1667:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1668:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1669:        children = skip_undefined([
 1670:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1671:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1672:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1673:     }]).
 1674: 
 1675: 
 1676: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1677:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1678: 
 1679: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1680:     [];
 1681: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1682:     [{K, V}].
 1683: 
 1684: mam_ns_attr() ->
 1685:     [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}].
 1686: 
 1687: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 1688:     undefined;
 1689: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 1690:     #xmlel{
 1691:         name = <<"start">>,
 1692:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 1693: 
 1694: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 1695:     undefined;
 1696: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 1697:     #xmlel{
 1698:         name = <<"end">>,
 1699:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 1700: 
 1701: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 1702:     undefined;
 1703: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 1704:     #xmlel{
 1705:         name = <<"with">>,
 1706:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 1707: 
 1708: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 1709: %% a certain query.
 1710: stanza_archive_request(QueryId) ->
 1711:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId,
 1712:                               undefined, undefined,
 1713:                               undefined, undefined).
 1714: 
 1715: stanza_date_range_archive_request() ->
 1716:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1717:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 1718:                               undefined, undefined).
 1719: 
 1720: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(Start, Stop) ->
 1721:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1722:                               Start, Stop,
 1723:                               undefined, undefined).
 1724: 
 1725: stanza_limit_archive_request() ->
 1726:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 1727:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 1728: 
 1729: stanza_page_archive_request(QueryId, RSM) ->
 1730:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 1731: 
 1732: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID) ->
 1733:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, undefined,
 1734:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 1735: 
 1736: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1737:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1738:        name = <<"query">>,
 1739:        attrs = mam_ns_attr()
 1740:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 1741:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 1742:        children = skip_undefined([
 1743:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 1744:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 1745:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1746:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1747:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 1748:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 1749:     }]).
 1750: 
 1751: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 1752:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 1753: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 1754:     [].
 1755: 
 1756: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 1757:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 1758: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 1759:     [].
 1760: 
 1761: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 1762:     [];
 1763: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 1764:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 1765:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 1766:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 1767:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 1768:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 1769: 
 1770: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 1771:     undefined;
 1772: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 1773:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1774:            children = skip_undefined([
 1775:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 1776:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 1777:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 1778: 
 1779: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 1780: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 1781: 
 1782: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 1783:     undefined;
 1784: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 1785:     #xmlel{
 1786:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 1787:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 1788: 
 1789: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 1790:     undefined;
 1791: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 1792:     #xmlel{
 1793:         name = <<"index">>,
 1794:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 1795: 
 1796: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 1797:     undefined;
 1798: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 1799:     #xmlel{
 1800:         name = <<"max">>,
 1801:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 1802: 
 1803: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 1804:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 1805:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 1806:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 1807:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 1808: 
 1809: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 1810:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 1811:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 1812:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 1813: 
 1814: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 1815:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 1816:     A =:= Raw.
 1817: 
 1818: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1819: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 1820: 
 1821: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 1822:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1823:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 1824:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1825:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 1826:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1827:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1828:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1829:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 1830:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 1831:     }]).
 1832: 
 1833: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 1834:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1835:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1836:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1837:     }]).
 1838: 
 1839: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 1840: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 1841:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 1842: 
 1843: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 1844:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 1845: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 1846:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 1847:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 1848: 
 1849: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1850: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 1851: 
 1852: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1853:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1854:     M = #forwarded_message{
 1855:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1856:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs)},
 1857:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 1858: 
 1859: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 1860:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 1861:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 1862:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1863:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 1864:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1865:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 1866: 
 1867: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
