 1868:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 1869:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 1870: 
 1871: 
 1872: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 1873:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 1874:     M#forwarded_message{
 1875:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1876:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 1877: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1878:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 1879:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 1880:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1881:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1882:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1883:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 1884:                 M1, Children).
 1885: 
 1886: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 1887:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 1888:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 1889: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 1890: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 1891:     M.
 1892: 
 1893: %% Num is 1-based.
 1894: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 1895:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 1896:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 1897:     Id.
 1898: 
 1899: 
 1900: %% @doc Result query iq.
 1901: %%
 1902: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1903: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1904: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1905: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 1906: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1907: %%     []}]
 1908: %%
 1909: %%
 1910: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1911: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1912: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1913: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 1914: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1915: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 1916: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 1917: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 1918: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 1919: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 1920: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 1921: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 1922: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 1923: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 1924: parse_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1925:                        attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1926:     IQ = #result_iq{
 1927:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1928:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1929:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1930:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1931: 
 1932: 'parse_children[iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"query">>, children = Children},
 1933:                      IQ) ->
 1934:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1935: 
 1936: 
 1937: 'parse_children[iq/query]'(#xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1938:                                   children = Children},
 1939:                            IQ) ->
 1940:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1941: 
 1942: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"first">>,
 1943:                                       attrs = Attrs,
 1944:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, First}]},
 1945:                                IQ) ->
 1946:     Index = case proplists:get_value(<<"index">>, Attrs) of
 1947:                 undefined -> undefined;
 1948:                 X -> list_to_integer(binary_to_list(X))
 1949:             end,
 1950:     IQ#result_iq{first_index = Index, first = First};
 1951: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"last">>,
 1952:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Last}]},
 1953:                                IQ) ->
 1954:     IQ#result_iq{last = Last};
 1955: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"count">>,
 1956:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Count}]},
 1957:                                IQ) ->
 1958:     IQ#result_iq{count = list_to_integer(binary_to_list(Count))};
 1959: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(_, IQ) -> IQ.
 1960: 
 1961: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 1962: 
 1963: 
 1964: 
 1965: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 1966:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 1967:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1968: 
 1969: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 1970:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 1971:                            IQ) ->
 1972:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 1973:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 1974:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 1975: 
 1976: 
 1977: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1978:                                         children = Children},
 1979:                                  IQ) ->
 1980:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 1981: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1982:                                         children = Children},
 1983:                                  IQ) ->
 1984:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 1985: 
 1986: 
 1987: parse_jids(Els) ->
 1988:     [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(JID) %% MongooseIM normalizes JIDs
 1989:      || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 1990: 
 1991: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 1992: %%   <error type='modify'>
 1993: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 1994: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 1995: %%   </error>
 1996: %% </iq>
 1997: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1998:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1999: 
 2000:     IQ = #error_iq{
 2001:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 2002:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2003:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2004: 
 2005: 
 2006: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 2007:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 2008:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 2009:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2010:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 2011: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 2012:     IQ.
 2013: 
 2014: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 2015:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 2016:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 2017: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 2018:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 2019: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 2020:     IQ.
 2021: 
 2022: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2023: %% Helpers (muc)
 2024: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2025: 
 2026: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 2027:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 2028:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 2029:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 2030:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 2031:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 2032: 
 2033: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 2034:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 2035:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2036:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2037:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2038:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}]).
 2039: 
 2040: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 2041:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 2042:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 2043:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 2044:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 2045: 
 2046: destroy_room(Config) ->
 2047:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 2048:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 2049:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 2050:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 2051:         _ -> ok
 2052:     end.
 2053: 
 2054: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 2055:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 2056:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 2057:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 2058:                    Room, Nick).
 2059: 
 2060: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 2061:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 2062: 
 2063: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2064:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2065: 
 2066: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2067:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2068: 
 2069: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2070:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2071: 
 2072: 
 2073: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2074:     Pid = self(),
 2075:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2076:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2077:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2078:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2079:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2080: 
 2081:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2082:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2083: 
 2084:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2085:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2086:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2087:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2088:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2089:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2090:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2091:         %% Get whole history.
 2092:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2093:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2094:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2095:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2096:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2097:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2098:         ok
 2099:         end,
 2100:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2101:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2102:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2103:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2104: 
 2105:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2106:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2107: 
 2108: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2109:     Pid = self(),
 2110:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2111:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2112:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2113:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2114:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2115:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2116:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2117:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2118:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2119:         %% Get whole history.
 2120:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"all_messages">>)),
 2121:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2122:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2123:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2124:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2125:         ok
 2126:         end,
 2127:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2128:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2129:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2130:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2131: 
 2132:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2133:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2134: 
 2135: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2136:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2137: 
 2138: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2139:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2140:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2141: 
 2142: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2143:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2144:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2145:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2146:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2147:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2148:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2149:     Config.
 2150: 
 2151: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2152:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2153:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2154:     timer:sleep(500),
 2155:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2156:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2157:     Config.
 2158: 
 2159: serv_users(Config) ->
 2160:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2161:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2162: 
 2163: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2164:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2165:     {Server, Username}.
 2166: 
 2167: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2168: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2169:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2170:        0 -> ok;
 2171:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2172:     end.
 2173: 
 2174: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2175: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2176:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2177:        0 -> ok;
 2178:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2179:     end.
 2180: 
 2181: 
 2182: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2183:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2184: 
 2185: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2186:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2187: 
 2188: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2189:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2190: 
 2191: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2192:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2193: 
 2194: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2195:     %% Do not care
 2196:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2197:     ok.
 2198: 
 2199: wait_message_range(Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2200:     wait_message_range(Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2201: 
 2202: wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2203:     [IQ|Messages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Client),
 2204:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2205:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2206:     try
 2207:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2208:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2209:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2210:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2211:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2212:         ok
 2213:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2214:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2215:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2216:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2217:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2218:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2219:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2220:     end.
 2221: 
 2222: 
 2223: wait_empty_rset(Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2224:     [IQ] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2225:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2226:     try
 2227:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2228:         ok
 2229:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2230:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2231:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2232:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2233:     end.
 2234: 
 2235: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2236:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2237:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2238:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2239:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2240:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2241:     end.
 2242: 
 2243: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2244:     random:seed(now()),
 2245:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2246:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2247:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2248:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2249:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2250:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2251:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2252:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2253:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2254:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2255:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2256: 
 2257: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2258:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2259:         ID1 =< ID2
 2260:     end,
 2261:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2262: 
 2263: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2264:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2265:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2266:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2267:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2268:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2269: 
 2270: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2271:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2272: 
 2273:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2274:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2275: 
 2276: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2277:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2278:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2279:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2280:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2281:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2282:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2283:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2284: 
 2285: random_time() ->
 2286:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2287:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2288:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2289: 
 2290: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2291:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2292:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2293:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2294:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2295: 
 2296: 
 2297: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2298:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2299: 
 2300: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2301:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2302:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2303:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2304:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2305:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2306:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2307: 
 2308: archive_message(Args) ->
 2309:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2310: 
 2311: 
 2312: 
 2313: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2314:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2315: 
 2316:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2317:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2318:     R = room_address(Room),
 2319: 
 2320:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2321:     Host = host(),
 2322:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2323:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2324:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2325:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2326:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2327:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2328:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2329:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2330: 
 2331:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2332: 
 2333:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2334: 
 2335:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2336: 
 2337: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2338:     Host = host(),
 2339:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2340: 
 2341: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2342:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2343:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2344:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2345:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2346: 
 2347: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2348: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2349:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2350:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2351: 
 2352: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2353:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2354: 
 2355: 
 2356: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2357:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2358: 
 2359: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2360:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2361:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2362:         Other ->
 2363:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2364:             false
 2365:     end.
 2366: 
 2367: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2368:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2369:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2370:             true;
 2371:         _ ->
 2372:             false
 2373:     end.
 2374: 
 2375: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2376:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2377: 
 2378: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2379:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2380:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2381:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2382:     Client.
 2383: 
 2384: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2385:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2386:         undefined ->
 2387:             ok;
 2388:         Value ->
 2389:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2390:     end.
 2391: 
 2392: 
 2393: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2394: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2395: %%
 2396: %% Messages:
 2397: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2398: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2399: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2400: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2401: %%
 2402: %% Each tuple is
 2403: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2404: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2405: prefs_cases() ->
 2406:     [
 2407:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2408:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2409:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2410:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2411:  
 2412:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2413:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2414:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2415:  
 2416:  
 2417:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2418:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2419:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2420:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2421:  
 2422:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2423:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2424:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2425:  
 2426:  
 2427:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2428:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2429:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2430:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2431:  
 2432:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2433:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2434:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2435:     ].
 2436: 
 2437: 
 2438: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2439:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2440:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2441:         [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases()]
 2442:         end,
 2443:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2444: 
 2445: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2446:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2447:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set
 2448:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % presence subscribe
 2449: 
 2450:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2451:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3, 5000), % iq set, presence subscribed, presence
 2452:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2453: 
 2454:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2455:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000), % iq set subscription=to, presence subscribe
 2456:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2457: 
 2458:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2459:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=both
 2460:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3, 5000), % iq set subscription=both, presence subscribed, presence
 2461:         ok.
 2462: 
 2463: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2464:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2465:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2466:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2467:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("n=~p, prefs=~p, now=~p",
 2468:                                                [N, PrefsState, now()]))
 2469:                 || N <- [1,2,3,4]],
 2470:     %% Messages:
 2471:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2472:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2473:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2474:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2475:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 2476:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 2477:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 2478:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 2479:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 2480:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 2481:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 2482:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2483:     %% Get last four archived texts
 2484:     Stanzas = get_last_four_messages(Alice),
 2485:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2486:     Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2487:     ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 2488:     ?assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 2489:                         [{prefs_state, PrefsState}]),
 2490:     ok.
 2491: 
 2492: get_last_four_messages(Alice) ->
 2493:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 2494:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2495:     [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2496:     AllMessages.
 2497: 
 2498: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 2499:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 2500:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 2501:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 2502:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 2503: 
 2504: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 2505:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
 2506: 
 2507: print_configuration_not_supported(C, B) ->
 2508:     I = io_lib:format("issue=configuration_not_supported, "
 2509:                        "configuration=~p, basic_group=~p", [C, B]),
 2510:      binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(I)).
 2511: 
 2512: %% The same as prefs_set_request case but for different configurations
 2513: run_set_and_get_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2514:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 2515:         [run_set_and_get_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases()]
 2516:         end,
 2517:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 2518: 
 2519: %% Alice sets and gets her preferences
 2520: run_set_and_get_prefs_case({PrefsState, _ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Config) ->
 2521:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2522:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2523:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 2524: 
 2525:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 2526:     ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2527: 
 2528:     ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 2529:     ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 2530:     ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 2531:     ok.
